full_summary:
### ACAN Anthim Tender Notice
#### Reference Number: WS4311929152

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to participate in an advance contract award notice (ACAN) for the procurement of **Drugs and Pharmaceutical Products** as part of the ACAN Anthim project.

**Project Details:**

* **Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)** is the intended end-user of the contract.
* The expected contract start date is **December 22, 2023**.
* The procurement category is **Goods** (GD).
* The contract value is not disclosed.

**Tender Information:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** December 4, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Publication Date:** November 16, 2023
* **Amendment Date:** November 16, 2023
* **Procurement Method:** Advance contract award notice

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender opportunity may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

The tender opportunity is open to suppliers from **Canada**.

**Regions of Delivery:**

The contract will be delivered within the **National Capital Region (NCR)**.

**Contact Information:**

For questions or concerns regarding this tender notice, please contact Sharon Joy at **sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents can be accessed at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18028785?extsite=MTgwMjg3ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Note: The rewritten entry has been edited to conform to a professional tone, while maintaining the original information and details. The changes made include:
